dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 8348 IH: United States NATO Force Deployment Policy Act of 2022
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Bacon introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To provide it is the policy of the United States that the NATO-Russia Founding Act, signed May 27, 1997, in Paris, does not constrain the deployment of United States or NATO forces in any way.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the United States NATO Force Deployment Policy Act of 2022.
It is the policy of the United States that the NATO-Russia Founding Act, signed May 27, 1997, in Paris, does not constrain the deployment of United States or NATO forces in any way.
